text: Hey, {name}. This is {company_name}. Here is the link to the sign in sheet for {course_name}. Please note that you cannot receive your course completion certificate without completing this sign in sheet. {sign_in_url}

email.subject: {course_name} sign in sheet
email.body:
Hey {name},

{sign_in_url}

Please note that you cannot receive your course completion certificate without completing this sign in sheet.

Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions.

Respectfully,

{company_name}
